title: Smart Contract Developer (DeFi Protocol)
description:
We're building the next-generation decentralized exchange on Arbitrum.

Your role will involve writing secure, gas-optimized smart contracts in Solidity, integrating oracles (Chainlink), and building protocol logic for liquidity pools and staking rewards.

Prior experience with EVM, Foundry/Hardhat, and basic understanding of ZK rollups is a plus.

title: Lens Protocol Content Strategist
description:
We are looking for a creative content strategist with deep knowledge of Lens Protocol and Web3 social.

Responsibilities include creating engaging blog posts, tutorials, and short-form video scripts that educate and onboard creators to Lens. You'll work closely with devs and designers to shape content for launches and community updates.

Bonus if you've used Lens firsthand and are familiar with its social primitives.

title: Rust Developer for Solana NFT Tool
description:
Join our dev team to build a CLI tool and backend services for managing NFT metadata and minting on Solana.

You must be fluent in Rust and have prior experience building on-chain programs (smart contracts) using Anchor framework. The tool will automate batch minting and metadata uploads to Arweave/IPFS.

Familiarity with Metaplex is a strong plus.

title: Community Manager for DAO Launch
description:
Help us launch and grow our new DAO focused on DeFi education.

You'll manage Discord, Twitter, and governance forums, organize weekly AMAs, and create engaging campaigns that bring in active members. Experience with Snapshot, Discourse, and DAO tooling is required.

You should be able to track community sentiment and coordinate feedback loops between core team and community.

title: Chainlink Integration Engineer
description:
We're integrating real-world data feeds into our prediction market protocol and need a Chainlink expert.

Tasks will include deploying Oracle contracts, testing on testnets (Sepolia/Polygon Mumbai), and working with off-chain data sources via Chainlink Functions. Must have experience with Chainlink nodes and keeper networks.

Ideal candidate has worked on similar integrations in production.

title: Frontend Engineer (Lens Social App)
description:
We're developing a social dApp powered by the Lens Protocol.

You'll build dynamic UI components in React using Tailwind CSS, integrate wallet connection (ConnectKit), and display Lens user feeds and interactions.

Experience with TypeScript and GraphQL is preferred.

title: EVM Chain Indexer (Rust)
description:
Join us in building a high-performance chain indexer for an Ethereum-compatible L2.

Your role will involve writing Rust services that parse and store block data in Postgres, handle event decoding, and expose a REST API.

Familiarity with Substrate, The Graph, or similar tech is welcome.

title: Smart Contract Security Auditor
description:
We need a Solidity expert to audit a new DAO and staking contract suite.

Your tasks will include identifying reentrancy risks, front-running vulnerabilities, and testing with Foundry fuzzing.

A solid understanding of access control and proxy patterns is a must.

title: ZK Proof Developer (zkSync)
description:
Help implement zk-SNARK-based vote verification for our DAO governance layer.

Youâ€™ll write custom circuits using Circom and integrate them in a zkSync-compatible smart contract.

Experience with ZKP concepts and tooling is required.

title: Crypto Content Writer (Web3 Education)
description:
Write educational blog posts and guides on crypto topics such as DeFi, DAOs, and NFTs.

You'll work with our dev team to explain technical concepts in accessible language, backed by real examples.

Writing experience in crypto/web3 is essential.

title: Multichain NFT Dashboard
description:
Build a React dashboard that aggregates NFT holdings from Ethereum, Polygon, and Arbitrum.

Includes wallet connection, metadata rendering, and filters for collections and chains.

Experience with Moralis or Alchemy SDK preferred.

title: Token Gating API
description:
Develop a backend API in Node.js that verifies ERC-20 and NFT ownership using smart contract calls.

The API will be used to control access to token-gated content across multiple apps.

Must be efficient, secure, and gas-aware.

title: Snapshot Voting UI Integration
description:
We're launching a DAO using Snapshot and need a frontend to show and cast proposals.

You'll fetch proposals via the Snapshot API and integrate vote submission using connected wallets.

React, Tailwind, and wagmi experience required.

title: Stablecoin Arbitrage Bot
description:
Create a bot that identifies and executes arbitrage opportunities across Curve, Uniswap, and Balancer pools.

Must monitor price deltas and account for slippage and gas cost.

Solid background in MEV and DeFi preferred.

title: Developer Advocate (EVM Tooling)
description:
We're seeking a technical evangelist to create demos, tutorials, and workshops around our EVM development tools.

You'll interact with devs on Discord, write sample apps, and speak at events.

Must be passionate about Web3 and teaching.

title: Lens Analytics Script
description:
Write a TypeScript script that fetches a user's Lens activity and generates summary stats.

Metrics include posts, mirrors, followers, and engagement rates. Output should be in JSON.

Use Lens API and support pagination.

title: Chainlink Oracle Integration
description:
Integrate Chainlink price feeds and randomness VRF into our staking game contract.

You'll work with Solidity, deploy to testnets, and simulate feed results.

Must know Chainlink best practices and LINK token mechanics.

title: Gas Efficiency Report Generator
description:
Build a CLI tool that analyzes gas usage of smart contract deployments and function calls.

Should integrate with Hardhat and output CSV reports comparing deployments.

Great for devs who enjoy tooling and optimization.

title: Design Web3 Job Board UI (Figma)
description:
Help us design a sleek, crypto-themed UI for a decentralized job board.

Must be comfortable with dark UIs, modern layout grids, and Figma.

Bonus if you understand basic Web3 UX flows.

title: Build a Delegation Contract System
description:
Create a smart contract system that lets users delegate voting rights for DAOs.

Should support signature-based delegation, cancelation, and event logging.

Audit-friendly architecture is a must.
